headline: FEI FOCUSED ION BEAM SYSTEM
description: Focus Ion Beam System    The FEI 200xP FIB is a proven work horse in the industry.   This versatile system is capable of 7nm image resolution.
categories.lvl2: Microscopes  >  Electron Microscopy > Focused Ion Beam Tools
specstable:
Manufacturer FEI
Model 200XP TMP
Description Prelens Ion Column, 50mm Stage, 2 GIS, CDEM, Turbo Pumped

50mm Four Axis Stage
CDEM (Continous Dynode Electron Multiplier) Seconday Detector
(3) Gas Injection Systems (GIS).
Pt Deposition, IEE(insulator enhanced etch), SCM (selective cabon milling)
NB: GIS do not contain precursor materials
Charge Neutralization System
